title: Cardinal Malcolm Ranjith holds prayer service in the Vatican
content: Archbishop of Colombo Cardinal Malcolm Ranjith who is currently in the Vatican is to hold a prayer service at St Peter’s Square on Sunday February 27 2022, Convener of Global Forum of Easter Sunday Massacre Victims, Stephen Muller said today.“The objective of the prayer service will be to seek divine intervention to uncover the truth behind the Easter Sunday attacks,” Mr. Muller said in a statement which was aired via social media today.
